name: TVElementAlignment
desc: Location of an item inside of an element on the horizontal axis.

items.name: case undefined
items.desc: The alignment has not been defined for the item.

items.name: case left
items.desc: The item is aligned along the left side of the containing element.

items.name: case center
items.desc: The item is aligned in the center of the containing element.

items.name: case right
items.desc: The item is aligned along the right of the containing element.

items.name: case leading
items.desc: The item is aligned along the leading edge of the containing element.

items.name: case trailing
items.desc: The item is aligned along the trailing edge of the containing element.
